column4: another B−29 dropped the second bomb on the industrial section of the city of Nagasaki
column5: totally destroying 1 1/2 square miles of the city

column1: 1102|11:02|“Yes.” Perena’s firm tone brooked no argument. “It exploded at 11:07. You would have entered at 11:02
column2: so that by then you would have been exactly midway between the Gates.”
